title: Anneliese Dodds – 2023 Comments on the Personal Conduct of Steve Brine
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, on 9 March 2023.
content:
If Steve Brine has broken lobbying rules he must face the consequences. Rishi Sunak has been too weak to stand up to his party or his cabinet. Will he take the appropriate action in this case?
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
